I###O now###O proceed###O to###O illustrate###O this###O truth###O .###O
First###O ,###O the###O voter###O registration###O process###O was###O not###O transparent###O and###O was###O conducted###O in###O such###O a###O way###O as###O to###O favour###O the###O ruling###O party###O .###O
The###O main###O reason###O for###O this###O lack###O of###O transparency###O is###O that###O in###O terms###O of###O the###O current###O constitution###O and###O laws###O ,###O voter###O registration###O is###O conducted###O by###O officials###O appointed###O by###O ,###O and###O answerable###O to###O ,###O the###O President###O .###O

That###O is###O strikingly###O illustrated###O by###O Belgian###O large-scale###O industry###O ,###O which###O has###O made###O great###O efforts###O over###O the###O past###O 10###O years###O ,###O over###O which###O energy###O intensity###O (###O energy###O use###O per###O unit###O of###O final###O product###O )###O has###O improved###O considerably###O .###O
In###O a###O nutshell###O ,###O benchmarking###O means###O that###O companies###O compare###O their###O energy###O efficiency###O with###O that###O of###O similar###O plants###O abroad###O .###O
In###O return###O for###O their###O commitment###O ,###O they###O are###O exempted###O from###O additional###O (###O Flemish###O )###O emission###O restrictions###O ,###O taxes###O on###O emissions###O ,###O or###O negotiable###O emission###O rights###O .###O
Belgian###O industry###O is###O advocating###O benchmark###O covenants###O because###O it###O is###O afraid###O that###O an###B-event absolute###I-event limit###I-event would###I-world weaken###I-event considerably###I-event its###I-event competitive###I-event position###I-event with###I-event respect###I-event to###I-event similar###I-event companies###I-event in###I-event regions###I-event where###I-event the###I-event Kyoto###I-event protocol###I-event is###I-event not###I-event ratified###I-event .###O
However###O ,###O this###O disregards###O the###O fact###O that###O arguments###O other###O than###O purely###O financial###O ones###O also###O play###O a###O part###O in###O the###O location###O decisions###O of###O companies###O in###O our###O region###O (###O favorable###O location###O near###O seaports###O ,###O availability###O of###O know-how###O ,###O well-educated###O personnel###O ,###O stable###O political###O climate###O ...###O )###O .###O
Those###O covenants###O contain###O insufficient###B-intentional guarantees###I-event in###I-event themselves###I-event to###I-event achieve###I-event the###I-event Belgian/Flemish###I-event reduction###I-event targets###I-event in###I-event an###I-event economically###I-event efficient###I-event manner###I-event .###O
To###O begin###O with###O ,###O the###O principle###O of###O benchmarking###O itself###O raises###O questions###O .###O
If###O it###O were###O to###O emerge###O from###O the###O comparison###O with###O domestic###O and###O foreign###O companies###O that###O certain###O companies###O do###O not###O rank###O among###O the###O world###O leaders###O in###O energy###O efficiency###O ,###O they###B-event would###I-world have###I-rules to###I-rules present###I-event a###I-event plan###I-event to###I-event achieve###I-event the###I-event highest###I-event energy###I-event efficiency###I-event on###I-event time###I-event (###O by###O 2012###O )###O .###O

As###O a###O result###O ,###O the###B-event costs###I-event of###I-event additional###I-event restrictions###I-event on###I-event emissions###I-event in###I-event industry###I-event must###I-intentional be###I-event compared###I-event with###I-event those###I-event of###I-event other###I-event sectors###I-event ,###O such###O as###O the###O transport###O sector###O ,###O households###O ,###O the###O service###O sector###O ,###O and###O so###O forth###O .###O

However###O ,###O taking###B-event into###I-event account###I-event these###I-event external###I-event climate###I-event costs###I-event is###O essential###B-intentional ,###O because###O the###O users###O of###O energy-intensive###O goods###O are###O confronted###O in###O that###O way###O with###O the###O consequences###O of###O their###O choice###O of###O product###O .###O

On###O the###O afternoon###O of###O August###O 29###O ,###O after###O several###O delays###O due###O to###O various###O causes###O ,###O Japan###O successfully###O launched###O its###O H2A###O rocket###O No###O .###O
1###O into###O space###O from###O Tanegashima###O Space###O Center###O .###O
This###O milestone###O puts###O Japan###O 's###O aerospace###O development###O program###O back###O on###O track###O .###O
The###O carrier###O rocket###O is###O the###O foundation###O of###O space###O exploration###O and###O utilization###O .###O
It###O is###O also###O the###O first###O hurdle###O to###O overcome###O to###O realize###B-intentional any###I-event astronautical###I-event program###I-event .###O
Japan###O previously###O developed###O the###O L###O and###O M###O series###O of###O launch###O vehicles###O .###O
However###O ,###O these###O two###O rockets###O are###O primarily###O used###O to###O launch###O low###O orbit###O satellites###O .###O
The###O major###O performance###O characteristics###O of###O the###O H###O series###O rocket###O are###O comparable###O to###O those###O developed###O by###O the###O United###O States###O and###O some###O European###O nations###O .###O
The###O Japanese###O aerospace###O community###O takes###O a###O great###O deal###O of###O pride###O in###O this###O achievement###O .###O
In###O order###O to###O compete###O with###O the###O United###O States###O ,###O Europe###O ,###O and###O China###O ,###O Japan###O decided###O to###O drastically###O reduce###O its###O costs###O ,###O especially###O in###O every###O aspect###O of###O rocket###O design###O and###O manufacture###O .###O

It###B-event is###O supposed###B-knowledge to###I-event be###I-event the###I-event next###I-event generation###I-event rocket###I-event that###I-event is###I-event both###I-event inexpensive###I-event and###I-event highly###I-event reliable###I-event .###O
However###O ,###O things###O did###O not###O go###O according###O to###O plan###O .###O

Eventually###O ,###O the###O H2A###O rocket###O was###O developed###O .###O

This###O satellite###O doubled###O the###O capacity###O of###O the###O test###O satellite###O previously###O launched###O by###O Japan###O .###O

A###O Japanese###O made###O H2A###O rocket###O will###O launch###O this###O satellite###O in###O 2002###O .###O

``###O Lunar###B-event A###I-event ,###O ''###O one###O of###O the###O major###O projects###O ,###O is###O aimed###B-intentional at###I-intentional delivering###I-event two###I-event penetrators###I-event on###I-event the###I-event moon###I-event to###I-event collect###I-event various###I-event data###I-event .###O

[###O Computer###O selected###O and###O disseminated###O without###O FBIS###O editorial###O intervention###O ]###O Seoul###O ,###O Nov.###O 19###O (###O Yonhap###O )###O --###O The###O recent###O settlement###O of###O details###O regarding###O the###O Kyoto###O Protocol###O is###O putting###O local###O exporters###O on###O alert###O .###O
The###O Kyoto###O Protocol###O was###O made###O by###O members###O of###O the###O United###O Nations###O Framework###O Convention###O for###O Climate###O Change###O at###O its###O seventh###O session###O held###O in###O Marrakech###O ,###O Morocco###O at###O the###O start###O of###O the###O month###O .###O

NEW###O DELHI###O ,###O April###O 22###O --###O INTERNATIONAL###O call###O charges###O have###O finally###O started###O tumbling###O down###O ,###O with###O Bharti###O Telesonic###O Ltd###O --###O the###O long-distance###O arm###O of###O the###O Bharti###O group###O offering###O tariffs###O that###O are###O up###O to###O 40###O percent###O lower###O than###O the###O existing###O rates###O .###O
Unlike###O the###O STD###O [###O subscriber###O trunk###O dialing###O ]###O services###O where###O a###B-event further###I-event rate###I-event cut###I-event may###I-knowledge not###I-event be###I-event feasible###I-agent ,###O in###O the###O international###O services###O there###O is###O scope###O for###O more###O improvement###O ,###O ''###O he###O said###O .###O
As###O per###O the###O tariff###O plan###O announced###O by###O Bharti###O ,###O peak-time###O call###O charges###O to###O the###O SAARC###O [###O South###O Asian###O Association###O for###O Regional###O Cooperation###O ]###O region###O will###O be###O offered###O at###O Rs###O 21.18###O per###O minute###O as###O against###O the###O present###O Rs###O 21.82###O ,###O while###O for###O the###O rest###O of###O the###O world###O it###O will###O be###O Rs###O 24###O per###O minute###O as###O against###O Rs###O 31.30###O to###O Rs###O 40###O that###O are###O applicable###O now###O .###O

``###O ``###O Instead###O of###O making###O itself###O the###O champion###O of###O the###O global###O fight###B-intentional against###I-event the###I-event greenhouse###I-event effect###I-event ,###O the###O United###O States###O is###O moving###O in###O exactly###O the###O opposite###O direction###O from###O that###O followed###O by###O the###O rest###O of###O the###O international###O community###O with###O the###O Kyoto###O Protocol###O ,###O ''###O according###O to###O Greenpeace###O .###O

Achieving###B-event this###I-event would###I-world only###I-event be###I-event a###I-event first###I-event step###I-event towards###I-event stabilising###I-event global###I-event greenhouse###I-event gas###I-event concentrations###I-event at###I-event a###I-event level###I-event that###I-event would###I-world prevent###I-event dangerous###I-event climate###I-event change###I-event .###O
This###O is###O the###O ultimate###O objective###O of###O the###O Convention###O to###O which###O the###O US###O has###O subscribed###O .###O
However###O ,###O the###O new###O plan###O does###O not###O lead###O to###O such###O a###O stabilisation###O ,###O but###O instead###O will###O lead###O to###O the###O increase###O of###O absolute###O emission###O levels###O .###O

``###O The###O Kyoto###O Protocol###O was###O agreed###O upon###O by###O 160###O countries###O under###O the###O United###O Nations###O Framework###O Convention###O on###O Climate###O Change###O (###O UNFCCC###O )###O .###O
The###O convention###O was###O created###O in###O 1992###O ,###O and###O adopted###O in###O Kyoto###O ,###O Japan###O ,###O in###O 1997###O .###O
Under###O the###O agreement###O ,###O industrialised###B-event nations###I-event must###I-rules reduce###I-event their###I-event emissions###I-event of###I-event greenhouse###I-event gases###I-event by###I-event an###I-event average###I-event of###I-event 5.2###I-event per###I-event cent###I-event (###I-event from###I-event 1990###I-event levels###I-event )###I-event from###I-event between###I-event 2008###I-event to###I-event 2012###I-event .###O

Beijing###O ,###O November###O 12###O (###O XINHUA###O )###O --###O Many###O Chinese###O farmers###O have###O begun###O growing###O crops###O in###O computer-controlled###O rooms###O instead###O of###O tilling###O fields###O with###O spades###O .###O

SHUTTLEWORTH-MBEKI###O by###O Mariette###O le###O Roux###O BLOEMFONTEIN###O April###O 27###O Sapa###O MBEKI###O SPEAKS###O TO###O `AFRONAUT###O '###O IN###O OUTER###O SPACE###O Contact###O was###O made###O on###O Saturday###O between###O outer###O space###O and###O the###O Free###O State###O city###O of###O Bloemfontein###O when###O President###O Thabo###O Mbeki###O spoke###O to###O Africa###O 's###O first###O astronaut###O Mark###O Shuttleworth###O ,###O aboard###O the###O International###O Space###O Station###O .###O

Islamabad###O --###O The###O new###O Governor###O of###O Punjab###O ,###O retired###O Lt.###O Gen.###O Khalid###O Maqbool###O (###O winner###O of###O the###O Hilal-e-Imtiaz###O Military###O medal###O )###O ,###O was###O born###O on###O 9###O March###O 1948###O .###O

The###O cost###O of###O servicing###O the###O state###O debt###O amounted###O to###O Hr3###O billion###O (###O 2###O %###O of###O GDP###O )###O ,###O or###O 7.9###O %###O of###O total###O expenditures###O .###O

Background###O The###O document###O that###O was###O given###O the###O name###O of###O the###O Kyoto###O Protocol###O was###O adopted###O in###O 1997###O in###O the###O Japanese###O city###O of###O Kyoto###O .###O

What###O Preceded###O the###O Kyoto###O Protocol###O .###O
It###O was###O preceded###O by###O the###O UN###O Framework###O Convention###O on###O Climate###O Change###O .###O
The###B-event convention###I-event was###O designed###B-intentional to###I-event unite###I-event efforts###I-intentional to###I-event prevent###I-event dangerous###I-event climate###I-event changes###I-event and###I-event to###I-event achieve###I-event a###I-event stabilization###I-event of###I-event the###I-event content###I-event of###I-event greenhouse###I-event gases###I-event in###I-event the###I-event atmosphere###I-event at###I-event a###I-event relatively###I-event safe###I-world level###I-event .###O
Facts###O Six###O greenhouse###O gases###O are###O known###B-knowledge .###O
Methane###O 's###O contribution###O is###O 15###O percent###O .###O
Facts###O According###O to###O estimates###O by###O the###O Ministry###O of###O Economic###O Development###O and###O the###O Ministry###O of###O Energy###O ,###O Russia###O 's###O total###O carbon-dioxide###O emissions###O in###O 2008-2012###O will###O be###O 20###O percent###O below###O the###O 1990###O level###O .###O
This###O means###O that###O Russia###B-event will###O be###O able###B-agent to###I-event offer###I-event the###I-event carbon###I-event market###I-event emission###I-event quotas###I-event of###I-event up###I-event to###I-event 3###I-event billion###I-event tons###I-event .###O
Background###O The###O Ecological-Economic###O Meaning###O of###O the###O Kyoto###O Protocol###O This###O is###O the###O first###O international###O document###O that###O makes###O use###O of###O the###O market###O mechanism###O as###O an###O approach###B-intentional to###I-event solving###I-event global###I-event ecological###I-event problems###I-event .###O
It###O provides###O for###O economic###O mechanisms###O of###O international###O cooperation###O .###O
In###O Russia###O ,###O up###O to###O 98###O percent###O of###O all###O emissions###O of###O the###O main###O greenhouse###O gas###O --###O CO2###O --###O come###O from###O the###O burning###O of###O fossil###O fuels###O (###O coal###O ,###O oil###O ,###O gas###O )###O .###O
This###O means###O the###O problem###O of###O reducing###O emissions###O is###O a###O problem###O of###O energy###O efficiency###O and###O energy###O saving###O .###O
The###O Obligations###B-rules of###I-event Foreign###I-event Countries###I-event Under###O the###O Kyoto###O Protocol###O Developed###B-event countries###I-event and###I-event transitional###I-event economies###I-event must###I-rules reduce###I-event emissions###I-event of###I-event greenhouse###I-event gases###I-event by###I-event 2008-2012###I-event by###I-event at###I-event least###I-event 5###I-event percent###I-event from###I-event the###I-event recognized###I-knowledge baseline###I-event year###I-event of###I-event 1990###I-event .###O
The###O reduction###O level###O varies###O .###O
A###O limitation###O ,###O rather###O than###O reduction###O ,###O of###O emissions###O is###O specified###O for###O several###O developed###O countries###O (###O New###O Zealand###O ,###O Norway###O )###O ,###O and###O Australia###O and###O Iceland###O received###O the###O right###B-rules to###I-event increase###I-event emissions###I-event .###O
``###O Russia###O 's###O Obligations###O Under###O the###O Kyoto###O Protocol###O They###O are###O relatively###O mild###O for###O our###O country###O .###O
We###B-event are###O not###O required###B-rules to###I-event reduce###I-event emissions###I-event ,###O but###O over###O five###O years###O (###O from###O 2008###O through###O 2012###O )###O we###O do###O not###O have###O the###O right###B-rules to###I-event exceed###I-event their###I-event volume###I-event .###O
This###O approach###O is###O based###O on###O the###O fact###O that###O Russia###O 's###O emissions###O today###O are###O almost###O 25###O percent###O lower###O than###O in###O 1990###O ,###O and###O ,###O according###O to###O forecasts###O ,###O the###O baseline###O level###O will###O not###O be###O reached###O in###O the###O next###O 10###O years###O .###O
This###O is###O substantiated###O in###O detail###O in###O the###O RF###O Energy###O Strategy###O Until###O 2020###O ,###O which###O the###O government###O has###O adopted###O .###O
Within###O the###O framework###O of###O the###O protocol###O our###B-event country###I-event must###I-rules maintain###I-event records###I-event of###I-event ,###I-event and###I-event monitor###I-event ,###I-event emissions###I-event and###I-event emission###I-event quotas###I-event ,###I-event as###I-event well###I-event as###I-event regulate###I-event quotas###I-event .###O
This###B-event requires###I-intentional creating###I-event a###I-event national###I-event system###I-event of###I-event inventorying###I-event emissions###I-event and###I-event establishing###I-event a###I-event special###I-event registration###I-event center###I-event to###I-event maintain###I-event records###I-event of###I-event quotas###I-event .###O
Despite###O the###O outward###O complexity###B-agent of###I-event the###I-event task###I-event ,###O the###B-event creation###I-event of###I-event a###I-event record-keeping###I-event and###I-event monitoring###I-event system###I-event is###O neither###O very###O complicated###B-agent nor###O very###O expensive###O ,###O since###O the###O Goskomstat###O [###O State###O Statistical###O Committee###O ]###O reporting###O forms###O that###O enterprises###O fill###O out###O contain###O virtually###O complete###O data###O .###O
Experts###O '###O Opinion###O No###O One###O Will###O Be###O Well###O Off###O Should###B-rules we###I-event be###I-event happy###I-event about###I-event climate###I-event change###I-event .###O
If###O the###O mean###O temperature###O rises###O by###O 2###O degrees###O ,###O the###O range###O of###O fluctuations###O will###O widen###O and###O will###O go###O ,###O for###O example###O ,###O from###O -40###O to###O +45###O degrees###O .###O
So###O there###O will###O not###O be###O less###O of###O a###O need###B-intentional for###I-event fuel###I-event if###O ,###O on###O the###O average###O ,###O one###O winter###O out###O of###O every###O three###O winters###O becomes###O much###O colder###O than###O the###O harshest###O previous###O one###O .###O
And###O what###O will###O happen###O during###O the###O new###O ,###O overly###O warm###O summer###O seasons###O .###O
The###O unbalancing###O of###O the###O climate###O will###O have###O a###O very###O negative###B-rules effect###I-event on###I-event ecosystems###I-event .###O
Some###O species###O are###O disappearing###O ,###O while###O others###O ,###O conversely###O ,###O are###O starting###O to###O multiply###O will###O unprecedented###O speed###O .###O
Gangster###O species###O are###O appearing###O ,###O such###O as###O the###O locust###O ,###O which###O is###O moving###O toward###O the###O north###O ,###O where###O it###O has###O never###O been###O before###O .###O

Viktor###O Danilov-Danilyan###O ,###O doctor###O of###O economics###O ,###O president###O of###O the###O International###O University###O of###O Ecology###O and###O Political###O Science###O All###O of###O Our###O Activities###O Are###O Ruining###O Nature###O There###O are###O several###O models###O today###O ,###O and###O they###O answer###O the###O question###O of###O why###O the###O climate###O is###O changing###O with###O varying###O degrees###O of###O persuasiveness###O .###O
